properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
1. S/V ZEN DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO STEERING GEAR
   FAILURE IN 15-31.00N 058-57.39W AT 150138Z JAN.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
   INMARSAT-C: 422799024, TELEX: 42912008,
   PHONE: 59 659 670 9292, FAX: 59 659 663 2450,
   E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 116/13.
